project.name: django-grappelli
project.description:
Grappelli: A jazzy skin for the Django Admin-Interface (only available for standard-compliant browsers).
Take a look at the Screenshots.
RequirementsDjango 1.1.1+ (Please note that Grappelli is developed against the latest official Django release, not the trunk). Discussion/QuestionsUse the Grappelli Google-Group for asking questions, discuss development- and improvement-issues and stay informed about changes/updates: http://groups.google.com/group/django-grappelli. UpdatesMAKING GRAPPELLI A STANDALONE-APP: http://groups.google.com/group/django-grappelli/browse_thread/thread/cf5a1ebfdf4d0370. COMMENTS/SUGGESTIONS ARE VERY MUCH APPRECIATED. NOTE: Due to some heavy changes with the durrent Django-trunk (esp. with the admin-interface), Grappelli may not work as expected when using with an up-to-date development-checkout of Django. We´re working on this issues! 2009-11-28: Added CSRF-workaround for either Django 1.1.1 or SVN. 2009-11-13: Grappelli 2.0 is officially released. Documentation is updated. Updates InstallationInstallation Setup Available Settings DocumentationModelAdmin Options InlineModelAdmin Options Related Lookups Generic Relationships PositionField Using TinyMCE Customizing Navigation Areas Customizing the Admin Index Page Extending Templates InformationFAQ Features Release Notes Django Issues Reviews
